name: Haloa Tonono
story: Hunapo Babitu comes from a small island in the Caribbean. He joined the army at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional leadership skills. He was eventually given the role of Gendarmerie Commander and tasked with maintaining law and order within the BLUFOR faction. Hunapo is well-respected among his peers and is considered a rising star within the army. Despite his young age, he has already earned numerous accolades for his bravery and dedication to his duties.
